name: Zen Mode
short-desc: Changes 's form after each turn depending on its HP: Zen Mode below 50% max HP, and Standard Mode otherwise.
long-desc: This Pokemon switches between Standard Mode and Zen Mode after each turn depending on its HP.  Below 50% of its maximum HP, it switches to Zen Mode, and at 50% or above, it switches to Standard Mode.  This Pokemon returns to Standard Mode upon leaving battle or losing this ability.  This ability has no effect if this Pokemon is not a .
